column4: has anyone had sound problems with ubuntu breezy?  I installed ubuntu for the first time a couple days and sound worked fine from the start.  I had to reinstall ubuntu today because I have triple boot and it messed up.  Now I get sound effects but no music.  I don't understand why.
the music doesn't work on pp racer and I can't play shoutcast at all
may be your speaker is mute
the sound effects for ubuntu work
